mapper.select: SELECT CO.COMMUNITY_ID, CA.CATEGORY, CO.COMMUNITY_TITLE, CO.COMMUNITY_DATE, CO.USER_ID FROM community as CO INNER JOIN members AS M ON CO.USER_ID = M.USER_ID LEFT JOIN category AS CA ON CO.CATEGORY_ID = CA.CATEGORY_ID ORDER BY CO.COMMUNITY_DATE DESC;

select count(*) as cnt from community where 1=1
AND COMMUNITY_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
AND USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
;

SELECT comm.COMMUNITY_ID, ca.CATEGORY, comm.COMMUNITY_TITLE, comm.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, comm.USER_ID ,comm.COMMUNITY_DATE FROM project_diet.community as comm INNER JOIN category as ca ON comm.CATEGORY_ID = ca.CATEGORY_ID WHERE ca.CATEGORY_ID LIKE 'C%'
AND COMMUNITY_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
AND USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
order by COMMUNITY_DATE DESC limit #{pageBegin}, #{pageScale} ;

SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(COMMUNITY_DATE), '-', LPAD(MONTH(COMMUNITY_DATE), 2, '0')) AS 연도_월, COUNT(COMMUNITY_TITLE) AS 게시글_수 FROM community WHERE COMMUNITY_DATE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY CONCAT(YEAR(COMMUNITY_DATE), '-', LPAD(MONTH(COMMUNITY_DATE), 2, '0')) ORDER BY 연도_월;
